accountDeletion.forceDeleteStep1: Soft delete community data (posts, comments, profiles)
accountDeletion.forceDeleteStep2: Hard delete personal data (vault, activities, emotions)
accountDeletion.forceDeleteWarning: Force delete will permanently remove the user without their request. This action follows the same deletion process but is admin-initiated.
accountDeletion.forceDeleteWarning2: This action cannot be undone after the hard delete phase begins.
accountDeletion.forceDeleteReasonPlaceholder: Explain why this user account is being force deleted...
accountDeletion.forceDeleteNote: Force delete allows you to permanently remove a user account without their request. Use with extreme caution.
